name: src/core/plugins.js
src/core/pubsub.js
PubSub
description: PubSub class provides event dispatching.
examples:
var pubsub = new PubSub('namespace');
pubsub.publish('event', {name: value});

return.description: Instance of the pubsub.

name: publish
description: Publish or broadcast events of interest with a specific topic name and arguments such as the data to pass along

name: subscribe
description: Subscribe to events of interest with a specific topic name and a callback function, to be executed when the topic/event is observed

return.description: A string token

name: unsubscribe
description: Unsubscribe from a specific topic, based on a tokenized reference to the subscription

return.description: PubSub instance

name: src/core/router-history.js
RouterHistory
description:
Router history manages the state of the router.
Handles cross-browser history management, based on either pushState and real URLs, or onhashchange and URL fragments.
Inspired by http://backbonejs.org/docs/backbone.html#section-196

name: getHash
description: Gets the true hash value.

name: getPath
description: Get the pathname and search params, without the root.

name: getFragment
description: Get the browser normailzed URL fragment form the path or hash.

name: src/ds/db.js
DB

unknown.tagValue: The DB class was created to help web developers build applications that work as well offline as they do online.
The constructor method that returns an instance of this DB class.

return.description: Instance of the DB class.

name: info

unknown.tagValue: I fetch general information of the database.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

name: allDocs

unknown.tagValue: Fetch multiple documents, indexed and sorted by the _id. Deleted documents are only included if options.keys is specified.

params.name: options.include_docs
params.description: Include the document itself in each row in the doc field. Otherwise by default you only get the _id and _rev properties.

params.name: options.conflicts
params.description: Include conflict information in the _conflicts field of a doc.

params.name: options.attachments
params.description: Include attachment data as base64-encoded string.

params.name: options.startkey
params.description: Get documents with IDs in range.

params.name: options.endkey
params.description: Get documents with IDs in a certain range (inclusive/inclusive).

params.name: options.inclusive_end
params.description: Include documents having an ID equal to the given options.endkey. Default: true.

params.name: options.limit
params.description: Maximum number of documents to return.

params.name: options.skip
params.description: Number of docs to skip before returning (warning: poor performance on IndexedDB/LevelDB!).

params.name: options.descending
params.description: Reverse the order of the output documents.

params.name: options.key
params.description: Only return documents with IDs matching this string key.

params.name: options.keys
params.description: Array of string keys to fetch in a single shot.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

unknown.tagValue: Retrieves a document, specified by docId.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

name: put

params.name: doc
params.description: The document object, must have _id	for creation, and _rev for updating

params.name: options
params.description: The options to send with the request

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

unknown.tagValue: I handle creating a new document with a generated _id

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

name: remove

unknown.tagValue: I handle removing a document from the data store.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

unknown.tagValue: Get an attachment from the data store.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

name: saveAttachment

unknown.tagValue: Save an attachment to the data store.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

name: bulkDocs

unknown.tagValue:
Bulk insert or remove documents from the data store.
Create, update or delete multiple documents. The docs argument is an array of documents.
If you omit an _id parameter on a given document, the database will create a new document and assign the ID for you.
To update a document, you must include both an _id parameter and a _rev parameter, which should match the ID and revision of the document on which to base your updates.
To delete a document, include a _deleted parameter with the value true.

return.description: A promise that is resolved/rejected upon success/failure.

name: changes

unknown.tagValue:
A list of changes made to documents in the database, in the order they were made. It returns an object with the method cancel(), which you call if you don’t want to listen to new changes anymore.
It is an event emitter and will emit a 'change' event on each document change, a 'complete' event when all the changes have been processed, and an 'error' event when an error occurs.
In addition to the 'change' event, any change will also emit a 'create', 'update', or 'delete' event.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to send with the changes request. All options default to false unless otherwise specified.

params.name: options.live
params.description: Will emit change events for all future changes until cancelled.

params.name: options.include_docs
params.description: Include the associated document with each change.

params.name: options.binary
params.description: Return attachment data as Blobs/Buffers, instead of as base64-encoded strings.

params.name: options.descending
params.description: Reverse the order of the output documents.

params.name: options.since
params.description: Start the results from the change immediately after the given sequence number. You can also pass 'now' if you want only new changes (when live is true).

params.name: options.limit
params.description: Limit the number of results to this number.

return.description: An object with cancel() on(event) methods.
